name: Alone in the universe
description:
Simple game made for Unexpected Jam in Godot Engine.

Controls

  • Move with A and D 
  • Jump with W 
  • Restart with R ( or by clicking on the clock top right )

Gameplay

  • Find all 6 parts of the rescue module
  • Each part give you some unexpected effect
  • Every minute you travel back in time and the game restarts, so you have to be fast!

When you pick some parts, the secret doors will open, so after restart it will be easier to pick them.
